fa8b283a-7978-5096-947c-b97302785c95.title: Selection of colour and location is to be in accordance with finishes schedule

c722300b-dddb-5275-85e8-5f128757b5f9.title: Use paints and finishes as per sow/finishes schedule. Samples to be approved by kapitol group

429adcb7-a509-538f-912d-69085699aa45.title: All samples to be approved prior to commencement and must include all green star requirements.

64129b82-10f3-5bed-8611-95b4b1a1998f.title: Painting: comply with the recommendations of those parts of asinzs 2311 2009 and asinzs 2312-1-2014 which are referenced in this section.

5a58ba9e-a9e5-5d54-b1fd-f44bf1f5ebf9.title: Protect door furniture and other fixtures. Use drop sheets.  Execute works in strict compliance with the manufacturers recommendations.

e5e3bd47-9952-5526-a0d9-6998d819edc4.title: As per finishes schedule/sow: allow for application of 1 coat  primer and 2 coats (dark colours 4 coats) finishing product.

7a2bba48-4584-5d57-b961-7629bcf7e099.title: Ensure that all works have been carried out in accordance with finishes schedule, approval of samples & manufacturers recommendations

146d1f42-2d4b-5de8-acf2-89ceff58d053.title: Clean up and remove any excess materials etc and place into correct waste bins

d0bbef14-7ee8-541c-83db-e8c54a1ca281.title: Contractor to leave adequate leftover paint in marked containers for touch up or as agreed with kapitol group defect rectification & maintenance as per care requirements
